name: Family Counselling
description: Addressing challenges in family dynamics, communication breakdowns, parental conflicts, behavioral issues in children, and major life transitions (e.g., divorce, loss).

name: Couples Counselling
description: Managing conflict, rebuilding trust, addressing infidelity, improving sexual and emotional intimacy, and navigating life stage changes.

name: Career & Stress Management
description: Managing conflict, rebuilding trust, addressing infidelity, improving sexual and emotional intimacy, and navigating life stage changes.

name: Trauma-Informed Care (Individual)
description: Treating Post-Traumatic Stress Disorder (PTSD), Complex Trauma, or recovering from emotional/physical abuse.

name: Anxiety & Mood Disorder Counselling
description: Treating conditions like Generalized Anxiety Disorder (GAD), Social Anxiety, Panic Disorder, Major Depressive Disorder (MDD), and Bipolar Disorder.

name: Youth & Adolescent Counselling
description: Dealing with academic stress, bullying, peer pressure, body image issues, emerging identity concerns, and family conflicts typical during adolescence.

name: Substance Abuse & Addiction Counselling
description: Addressing misuse of substances (alcohol, drugs), behavioral addictions (gambling, gaming), developing coping mechanisms for cravings, and relapse prevention.
